Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for retirement credit to emergency medical technicians and advanced emergency medical technicians for a child care leave of absence
Summary: Provides for retirement credit to emergency medical technicians and advanced emergency medical technicians for a child care leave of absence.
LawCode: Amd ยง609, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing retirement credit to emergency medical technicians and advanced emergency medical technicians for a child care leave of absence
